# Craft (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |

| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | [[Callarduran Smoothhands]], [[Dugmaren Brightmantle]], [[Dumathoin]], [[Flandal Steelskin]], [[Garl Glittergold]], Geb, Gond, [[Laduguer]], [[Moradin]], Thoth |

**Granted Powers:** You cast Conjuration (creation) spells at +1 caster level and gain [[Skill Focus (Feat)|Skill Focus]] as a bonus feat for either one [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] skill of your choice or [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] (only for the purpose of magical crafting).

**Craft Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Animate Rope (Spell)|Animate Rope]]****:** Makes a rope move at your command.

   **[[Make Whole (Spell)|Make Whole]]:** Repairs an object.

**2** **[[Wood Shape (Spell)|Wood Shape]]****:** Rearranges wooden objects to suit you.

**3** **[[Stone Shape (Spell)|Stone Shape]]****:** Sculpts stone into any shape.

   **[[Craftsmanship, Lesser (Spell)|Craftsmanship, Lesser]] <sup>M</sup>:** Emulate a single Craftô€„ž skill at as many ranks as caster level of experience + Int modifier 

        or gain a boost to [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] equal to the same.

**4** **[[Minor Creation (Spell)|Minor Creation]]****:** Creates one cloth or wood object.

   **[[Make Whole, Greater (Spell)|Make Whole, Greater]]:** As *[[Make Whole (Spell)|make whole]]*, but repairs 1d6 points of damage plus 1 point/level 

        when cast on a construct creature (maximum 10d6+10).

**5** **[[Wall of Stone (Spell)|Wall of Stone]]****:** Creates a stone wall that can be shaped.

   **Greater Craftsmanship <sup>M</sup>:** Bestows use of an Item Creation feat for 1 hour.

**6 [[Fantastic Machine (Spell)|Fantastic Machine]]:** Creates a machine to perform a single simple task.

   **[[Fabricate (Spell)|Fabricate]]:** Transforms raw materials into finished items.

**7** **[[Major Creation (Spell)|Major Creation]]****:** As *[[Minor Creation (Spell)|minor creation]]*, plus stone and metal.

**8** **[[Forcecage (Spell)|Forcecage]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Cube or cage of force imprisons all inside.

   **[[Transmute Metal to Wood (Spell)|Transmute Metal to Wood]]:** Metal within 40 ft. becomes wood.

**9 [[Fantastic Machine, Greater (Spell)|Fantastic Machine, Greater]]** Creates a machine to perform multiple tasks.
